languages.text:
Стволы святых орудий обвивает змея вычеканенных строк — полная летопись освоения слугами Омниссии систем, именуемых Токарными мирами.
Бортовые {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}макропушки{/g} средней дальности с 5 зарядами, наносящими по 30 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g}.

A serpent of embossed lines coils around the barrels of these holy weapons, a complete chronicle of the exploration of the systems called the Lathe Worlds by the servants of the Omnissiah.
Medium-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 5 shots, dealing 30 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.
languages.original_text:
Стволы святых орудий обвивает змея вычеканенных строк — полная летопись освоения слугами Омниссии систем, именуемых Токарными мирами.
Бортовые {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}макропушки{/g} средней дальности с 5 зарядами, наносящими по 30 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g}.

traits.locale_text: A serpent of embossed lines coils around the barrels of these holy weapons, a complete chronicle of the exploration of the systems called the Lathe Worlds by the servants of the Omnissiah.
A serpent of embossed lines coils around the barrels of these holy weapons, a complete chronicle of the exploration of the systems called the Lathe Worlds by the servants of the Omnissiah.
A serpent of embossed lines coils around the barrels of these holy weapons, a complete chronicle of the exploration of the systems called the Lathe Worlds by the servants of the Omnissiah.
A serpent of embossed lines coils around the barrels of these holy weapons, a complete chronicle of the exploration of the systems called the Lathe Worlds by the servants of the Omnissiah.

A serpent of embossed lines coils around the barrels of these holy weapons, a complete chronicle of the exploration of the systems called the Lathe Worlds by the servants of the Omnissiah.
Medium-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 5 shots, dealing 30 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

languages.text:
这件神圣武器的炮筒上刻着一条由文字构成的长蛇，上面以无法辨认的字迹记录着欧姆尼塞亚的仆人探索车床群界的编年史。
这种中程{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}宏炮{/g}组安装在侧舷，可发射5枚炮弹，每枚炮弹可造成30点{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text:
A serpent of embossed lines coils around the barrels of these holy weapons, a complete chronicle of the exploration of the systems called the Lathe Worlds by the servants of the Omnissiah.
Medium-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 5 shots, dealing 30 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

traits.locale_text: 这件神圣武器的弹筒上刻着一条由文字构成的长蛇，上面以无法辨认的字迹记录着欧姆尼塞亚的仆人探索车床群界的编年史。

languages.text:
この聖なる武器の銃身には、エンボス加工された蛇のような線が巻き付いている。これは万機神の従者達が、レイズワールドと呼ばれる星系を巡った完成されし物語である。中距離の舷側{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}マクロキャノン{/g}。
5発発射可能で、1発あたり30{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text:
A serpent of embossed lines coils around the barrels of these holy weapons, a complete chronicle of the exploration of the systems called the Lathe Worlds by the servants of the Omnissiah.
Medium-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 5 shots, dealing 30 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

traits.locale_text: この聖なる武器の銃身には、エンボス加工された蛇のような線が巻き付いている。それは万機神のしもべたちによる、旋盤の世界と呼ばれる星系の探検に関する完全な年代記である。

languages.text: Una serpiente de texto inscrito recorre los cañones de estas santas armas, narrando una crónica completa de la exploración de los sistemas que los sirvientes del Omnissiah llaman los Mundos Torno. {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Macrocañones{/g} laterales de medio alcance que disparan 5 veces e infligen 30 de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} por disparo.
languages.original_text:
A serpent of embossed lines coils around the barrels of these holy weapons, a complete chronicle of the exploration of the systems called the Lathe Worlds by the servants of the Omnissiah.
Medium-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 5 shots, dealing 30 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

traits.locale_text: Una serpiente de texto inscrito recorre los cañones de estas santas armas, narrando una crónica completa de la exploración de los sistemas que los siervos del Omnissiah llaman los Mundos Torno.

languages.text: Les inscriptions gravées qui s'enroulent autour des canons de ces armes sacrées chroniquent l'exploration des Mondes du Tour par les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie. {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Macro-canons{/g} latéraux à moyenne portée tirant 5 coups et infligeant 30 points de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} par coup.
languages.original_text:
A serpent of embossed lines coils around the barrels of these holy weapons, a complete chronicle of the exploration of the systems called the Lathe Worlds by the servants of the Omnissiah.
Medium-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 5 shots, dealing 30 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

traits.locale_text: Les inscriptions gravées qui s'enroulent autour des canons de ces armes sacrées chroniquent l'exploration des Mondes du Tour par les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie.

languages.text: Eine Schlange geprägter Linien windet sich um die Läufe dieser heiligen Waffen – eine komplette Chronik der Erkundung der als Lathe-Welten bekannten Systeme durch Diener des Omnissiah. Mittelstrecken-Breitseiten-{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Makro-Kanonen{/g}, die 5 Schüsse abfeuern und dabei 30 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} pro Schuss zufügen.
languages.original_text:
A serpent of embossed lines coils around the barrels of these holy weapons, a complete chronicle of the exploration of the systems called the Lathe Worlds by the servants of the Omnissiah.
Medium-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 5 shots, dealing 30 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

traits.locale_text: Eine Schlange geprägter Linien windet sich um die Läufe dieser heiligen Waffen – eine komplette Chronik der Erkundung der als Lathe-Welten bekannten Systeme durch Diener des Omnissiah.

languages.text:
Bu kutsal silahların namlularını dönüp dolanarak inen bir yılan kabartması sarar ve Torna Dünyaları adı verilen sistemlerin Hermesih hizmetkârlarınca keşfinin eksizsiz bir vakayinamesini barındırır.
Her biri 30 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}hasar{/g} veren 5 atış yapan orta menzilli, yan tarafa monte {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}makro toplar{/g}.
languages.original_text:
A serpent of embossed lines coils around the barrels of these holy weapons, a complete chronicle of the exploration of the systems called the Lathe Worlds by the servants of the Omnissiah.
Medium-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 5 shots, dealing 30 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.
